text: I see a lot of very interesting generative art and sound projects in your project list. If you think about it, many modern DJ's are doing generative music with various tools. And isn't every 3D graphics program effectively a very complex programming language that is a mixture of data, built-in algorithms, and lots of direct manipulation? I just saw the latest Marvel epic and the graphics are amazing.
